title: Get 15% Off!
description: Enjoy 15% off all bookings made this week. Available on all car types!

title: Free Upgrade Weekend
description: Book a standard car and get a free upgrade to premium every weekend.

title: Refer & Earn
description: Refer friends and earn ride credits when they book with your code.

title: Student Discount
description: Students get up to 20% off on weekday rentals with valid ID.
